nodes.text: The Jedi Monument was a memorial built by the people of New Holstice to commemorate all the Jedi who had died since the birth of the Galactic Republic. A being needed only to whisper a name and the memory moth's fluttering wings would mimic back the words for eternity. Memory moths were then released into a giant cylinder where thousands more were held. Anakin Skywalker added names of his fallen comrades after the Battle of Jabiim.
